full_tweet:
video generation shouldn't keep you guessing.

just shipped SSE support for api.airforce models ‚Äî streaming status updates vs silent loading screens. 

had to disable grok-video momentarily (upstream 500s) but the rest of the fleet is flying. üêù #OpenSource #BuildInPublic

image.prompt: Dynamic pixel art scene of a high-tech data stream. A glowing lime green (#ecf874) river of code and tiny film strips flows smoothly from left to right against a deep purple (#110518) background. The Pollinations bee is surfing on the data stream, wearing pixelated sunglasses. Text overlay in chunky 8-bit font: 'STREAMING'. Energetic, high contrast, arcade vibes.

reasoning: Focuses on a specific DevX/UX improvement (SSE/Streaming) rather than a generic 'update'. It admits a fault (disabling a broken model) which builds trust/authenticity. The tone is technical but accessible.
